comment:
* Callback to receive notifications when the Thread Operational Datasets are changed. * *

Applications which are interested in monitoring Thread network datasets should implement * this interface and register the callback with {@link #registerOperationalDatasetCallback}.

methods.name: void onActiveOperationalDatasetChanged(@Nullable ActiveOperationalDataset activeDataset)
methods.comment:
* Called when the Active Operational Dataset is changed.
         *
         * @param activeDataset the new Active Operational Dataset or {@code null} if the dataset is
         *     absent

methods.name: void onPendingOperationalDatasetChanged(@Nullable PendingOperationalDataset pendingDataset)
methods.comment:
* Called when the Pending Operational Dataset is changed.
         *
         * @param pendingDataset the new Pending Operational Dataset or {@code null} if the dataset
         *     has been committed and removed
